properties.entry: SELECT REG_NO , CL_NAME , TEACH_DATE , REG_DATE , START_TIME || '-' || END_TIME "SCH_TIME" , TO_CHAR(REG_PRICE, '999,999,999') || '원' "REG_PRICE" , REG_COUNT || '명' "REG_COUNT" , REG_CAL FROM REGISTER JOIN CLASS C USING(CL_NO) JOIN SCHEDULE USING(SCH_NO) WHERE C.MEM_NO = ? AND REG_STA = 2 AND REG_CAL = ? ORDER BY REG_NO DESC
